overview: In a YouTube review of his favorite video game, a man tells a story of heartbreak amongst the hints and tips on game-play...  Â  The film is a three minute parody of the 'Let's Play...'  YouTube video. The film uses 3D CGI to emulate the simple geometry and low resolution textures of a 90's video game as well as representing the narrators interior world as an 8 bit polygonal psychological landscape.
title: Let's Play Nomad X
